Module schedular
Package schedular.utilities

Class TimeConversion

java.lang.Object
schedular.utilities.TimeConversion
public class TimeConversion extends Object
This is a class to help with Date Conversions and other date related activity

      THis is to Compare if the Time Zone is not met
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - is the starting Date Time for the Appointment
      endDateTime - is the end Date Time for the Appointment
      endAppointmentDate - is the end Date Time for the Appointment
      appointmentDate - is the Appointment Date
      Returns:
      Boolean to the user to then take action accordingly

    • appointmentOverlapCheck

      public static Boolean appointmentOverlapCheck(String startDateTime, String endDateTime) throws SQLException
      This is to check if the Appointment selected falls anywhere in the existing appointments
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - , which are the appointment start times the user has selected
      endDateTime - which is the end time of the appointment that the user has selected
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating if the Appointment is not conflicting or it is
      Throws:
      SQLException - which is in case an error in SQL occurs

    • checkOverlap

      public static Boolean checkOverlap(String startDateTime, String endDateTime, Integer apptId) throws SQLException
      This is to check if there is an overlap between the dates and time of meetings
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - this is the start Date and Time of the Appointments
      endDateTime - this is the end Date and Time of the Appointments
      apptId - this is the Appointments ID to check if an existing Appointment is not already considered
      Returns:
      boolean which is a true or false Boolean indicating if an existing appointment exists
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs on the database side
